CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${item.recordTableName}` ( `id` BIGINT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键', `partition_id` INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '分区号', `offset` BIGINT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '消息在该分区号下的偏移量', `key` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '消息键值', `value` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '消息体的缩微样本', `timestamp` DATETIME(3) NOT NULL COMMENT '消息时间', `row_create_time` DATETIME(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3) COMMENT '创建时间', `row_update_time` DATETIME(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3) COMMENT'更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, UNIQUE INDEX `idx_partition_id_offset`(`partition_id`, `offset`) USING BTREE, INDEX `idx_offset`(`offset`) USING BTREE, INDEX `idx_key`(`key`) USING BTREE, INDEX `idx_timestamp`(`timestamp`) USING BTREE, INDEX `idx_row_create_time`(`row_create_time`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB COMMENT ='topic消息';
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${item.recordDetailTableName}` ( `id` BIGINT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键', `partition_id` INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '分区id号', `offset` BIGINT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '消息偏移量', `value` TEXT NOT NULL COMMENT '消息体', `row_create_time` DATETIME(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3) COMMENT '创建时间', `row_update_time` DATETIME(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3) COMMENT'更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, UNIQUE INDEX `idx_partition_id_offset`(`partition_id`, `offset`) USING BTREE, INDEX `idx_row_create_time`(`row_create_time`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB COMMENT ='topic消息主体';
